articles.title: US Researchers Detect Radio 'Heartbeat' Billions of Light-years from Earth - OpenGov Asia
articles.description: A distinct and periodic pattern of rapid radio bursts recorded by astronomers may have originated from a distant neutron star; this is an FRB with the clearest periodic pattern that has been found to date.
